text: Pluto's Judgement Day is a Mickey Mouse cartoon released theatrically in 1935. Although labeled a Mickey cartoon, the main star is Pluto. It was the 78th short film in the Mickey Mouse series to be released, the seventh of that year. ==Voice cast== * Walt Disney as Mickey Mouse * Pinto Colvig as Pluto * Billy Bletcher as Cat Prosecutor * Clarence Nash as the kitten & Cat Judge ==Television== *c. 1977 â€“ The Wonderful World of Disney episode #5: "Halloween Hall o' Fame" (TV) ==Home media== The short was released on December 4, 2001, on Walt Disney Treasures: Mickey Mouse in Living Color. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Disney animated movies Category:Short movies Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: Pluto's Judgement Day
